thread.title: 9 hilarious things Scarlett Moffat simply had to say on Gogglebox
thread.title_full: 9 hilarious things Scarlett Moffat simply had to say on Gogglebox

title: 9 hilarious things Scarlett Moffat simply had to say on Gogglebox
text:
9 hilarious things Scarlett Moffat simply had to say on Gogglebox 9 hilarious things Scarlett Moffat simply had to say on Gogglebox 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Scarlett Moffatt’s birthday is just around the corner – a bit of news the famous lady herself shared with us fans of Twitter. Can't believe it's my birthday tomorrow 🙈 
— Gogglebox Scarlett (@ScarlettMoffatt) October 16, 2015 
She’s the reason some of us tune into Gogglebox. In fact, the show would be very different if it wasn’t for Scarlett’s sharing her opinions on everything she watches on the telly. . @ScarlettMoffatt is the best thing about #Gogglebox – Always cracks me up! 
— Rachel Nicole (@Rachhh_xo) October 16, 2015 Scarlett is my spirit animal. #Gogglebox 
However, turning 25 is making the dark-haired TV critic rethink her living situation. In fact, Scarlett’s contemplating moving out of her parents’ home. 
And (understandably) we couldn’t cope with the news… Scarlett from #Gogglebox has me crying. If I was her mum she'd be home for life. #comedygold 
— Wain's World (@hungryhippo66) October 16, 2015 If Scarlett moves out, she'd better take the cameras with her. Or just go back to her mum and dad's every week to film #gogglebox 
— Laura Cooney (@cherrysodablog) October 16, 2015 
Here are a few one-liners from tonight’s Gogglebox to remind ourselves why we want her to stay. 1. On Daniel O’Donnell’s most cringeworthy dancing on Strictly ever (Channel 4 screenshot) 
SM: “At least he is trying to do some dancing.” 2. On Korean leader Kim Jong-un’s strict military regime (Channel 4 screenshot) 3. On imagining what it would be like to volunteer on DIY SOS 'I don't know how much help i'd be but i can make decent cups of tea' tbh i can relate Scarlett 😂 #Gogglebox 4. On royals Harry and William looking rather lush in their builder’s hats (Andy Stenning/Daily Mirror/PA) 
SM: “Oh my god! I actually love how they’ve got Harry and William written on the hats. It’s like they will get confused or something.” 5. On Prince William painting a house in DIY SOS (Channel 4 screenshot) 
SM: “Imagine someone going into to your house and saying ‘King of England painted that wall’!” 6. On a penguin feeding her young food that sort of looks like vomit in Patagonia (Channel 4 screenshot) 
SM: “That’s not cute. That’s not cute at all.” 7. On ex M&S boss Lord Rose talking about a stronger Britain "This isn't just any Europe… it's a Mark's and Spencers Europe." 😂😂😂😂 Scarlett tho #Gogglebox 
— V A L E N T I N A ☕ (@ValsCappuccino) October 16, 2015 8. On a guy swivelling on his chair like crazy in Experimental (Channel 4 screenshot) 'To be fair the best part of my day is swiggling on my chair at work' Love Scarlett Moffatt 😂😂 #Gogglebox @ScarlettMoffatt 9. On noughties chick flick Bridget Jones’s Diary (Channel 4 screenshot) 
SM: “If you are feeling shit about your life, you watch this.” Share article 
We don’t want you to leave Scarlett. Promoted Stories
